results.description: Uses news_pct_1min (high coverage, high user/alpha counts) to capture immediate momentum after news. Applied SUGGESTION1 by using a single high-quality field (did not combine to keep signal clean). SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector field used). SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage 0.9717). SUGGESTION4 applied by choosing a high userCount/alphaCount field. Kept implementation concise per KEEP_IN_MINDs. Confidence set to 0.75.

Captures early short-horizon continuation using news_pct_10min (good coverage/high use). Followed SUGGESTION1 (single robust field). SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage 0.7657). SUGGESTION4 applied. Implementation respects operator/datafield limits. Confidence 0.70.

Combine return and volume surprise: normalize short return by recent volume zscore to prefer moves with supporting volume. Applied SUGGESTION1 (2 fields: news_pct_5_min and news_vol_stddev). SUGGESTION3 not needed (both coverages >0.7). SUGGESTION4 applied by using news_vol_stddev (high alphaCount). Kept operator count low. Confidence 0.72.

Use news_atr_ratio to detect large range days that may lead to continuation. SUGGESTION1 single field (high coverage 0.7967). SUGGESTION4 applied. No vector fields so SUGGESTION2 skipped. Confidence 0.65.
If the 30-min post-news return is extreme, fade it expecting partial reversion. Used news_pct_30min (high coverage). Applied SUGGESTION1 single field; SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence 0.60.

Use news_eps_actual relative to typical move (eps driven moves often continue intraday). Combined news_eps_actual with news_pct_60min to measure continuation. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; SUGGESTION3 not needed (eps coverage 0.9646). SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.78.
Use news_high_exc_stddev to capture stocks that reach abnormal highs after news and expect continuation. SUGGESTION1 single robust field (coverage 0.9652). SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.66.
Use news_low_exc_stddev extremes to short-term mean revert when large dips occur. SUGGESTION1 single field (coverage 0.9707). SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.64.

Use news_open_gap to trade gap continuation (large opening gaps often continue intraday). coverage 0.6247 -> applied SUGGESTION3 ts_backfill to ensure robustness. Also used ts_zscore. SUGGESTION4 partially (open_gap userCount moderate). Confidence 0.58.

Trade when TON last price deviates from post-news vwap (momentum away from VWAP). Used news_ton_last and news_post_vwap. SUGGESTION1 applied (2 fields). Both have high coverage so SUGGESTION3 not used. Kept operators <=7. Confidence 0.68.
Isolate stock-specific move vs market using news_indx_perf ((EODClose-TONLast) - SPY move). Single high-quality field (coverage 0.9713). SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.67.
Scale short-term return by market cap to prefer liquid, meaningful moves: divide news_pct_10min zscore by news_cap. Both fields high coverage. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.62.
Use news_tot_ticks surge (liquidity + interest) to signal persistent moves. SUGGESTION1 single field news_tot_ticks (coverage 0.9691, high userCount). Confidence 0.63.
Longer intraday continuation using news_pct_120min. High coverage so SUGGESTION3 not applied. SUGGESTION4 used. Confidence 0.59.
Divide short return signal by ATR to prefer high IR moves (news_pct_30min / news_atr14). Both high coverage; SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.7.
Look for unusually low post-news range vs 30-day range (news_range_stddev negative) and expect breakout. coverage 0.6172 -> use ts_backfill per SUGGESTION3. Confidence 0.55.
Use news_short_interest to identify heavily shorted stocks where positive news can cause squeezes. High coverage 0.872; SUGGESTION4 applied. No vector fields. Confidence 0.68.
Use news_max_up_ret to capture strong upside after news likely to continue intraday. coverage 0.8458 acceptable. SUGGESTION1 single field used. Confidence 0.66.
Fade extreme down-moves using news_max_dn_ret (coverage 0.9704) reversed. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.62.
Use news_mins_1_pct_up to identify fast rallies (momentum) and trade continuation. coverage 0.8309, SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.60.
If price drops quickly (news_mins_1_pct_dn small), expect bounce; use inverse of zscore. coverage 0.8309; SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence 0.58.
Compare pre-session vwap to eod_vwap: extreme divergence signals reversion. Used news_pre_vwap and news_post_vwap. Both good coverage. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.56.
If session open deviates from TONLast (price at news), use news_open and news_ton_last to capture follow-through. Both fields coverage >0.7. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.61.
Use pre_vwap vs ton_last for premarket move continuation. news_pre_vwap and news_ton_last both have strong coverage; SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.57.
Prefer moves with liquidity: divide return zscore by news_mov_vol. SUGGESTION1 used two fields and SUGGESTION4 chosen high userCount fields. Confidence 0.66.
Combine eps actual and PE to prefer large EPS surprises on lower PE (more reaction). SUGGESTION1 applied (news_eps_actual, news_pe_ratio). Both high coverage. Confidence 0.74.
Use news_ratio_vol (curr_vol/mov_vol) to signal breakout with volume confirmation. coverage 0.5122 -> apply ts_backfill per SUGGESTION3. SUGGESTION4 partially (userCount moderate). Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Intraday reversal when ticks surge but price weak
results.description: High ticks with weak pct_30min suggests selling pressure; combine news_tot_ticks and news_pct_30min. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; both have high coverage. Confidence 0.63.
Use news_mins_20_chg (coverage 0.9142) to find moves sustaining over 20-minute buckets. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Short-term overreaction filter: post 30sec spike fade
results.description: Use news_pct_30sec to detect micro spikes and fade them (mean-reversion). High coverage (0.9673). SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.56.
Use news_session_range_pct to detect expansion and trade continuation. coverage 0.268 (low) -> apply ts_backfill as per SUGGESTION3. Kept operators simple. Confidence 0.48.
Multiply zscores of 1min and 10min returns to prefer consistent momentum across horizons. SUGGESTION1 combined two high-coverage fields. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.73.
Scale momentum by inverse of open volume to avoid illiquid false signals. news_open_vol coverage 0.4361 -> ts_backfill applied per SUGGESTION3. Combined with news_pct_5_min. Confidence 0.52.
Use nws12_prez_1_minute (pre-market 1-min move) to predict open continuation. coverage around 0.4144 -> ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4 limited (lower counts). Confidence 0.50.

Use news_pct_60min adjusted by SPY (news_spy_close/spylast embedded in news_indx_perf) but simpler: use news_result_vs_index. coverage high (0.9733). SUGGESTION1 used high-quality field. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Opening strength normalized by 30-day avg vol
results.description: Divide opening move (news_open - news_prevclose) by mov_vol to favor liquid valid moves. news_prevclose low coverage (0.1728) -> ts_backfill applied per SUGGESTION3. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. Confidence 0.55.

If max down amount is large but minutes to recover small (nws12_mainz_01l), expect continued strength. Used news_max_dn_amt and nws12_mainz_01l. Both have good coverage -> SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.60.
Divide ticks by minutes-to-1pct to prefer fast, active moves. news_tot_ticks high coverage; news_mins_1_pct_up coverage 0.8309 -> SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Persistent gap fade if low volume
results.description: If open gap exists but curr_vol < mov_vol, fade gap. Used news_open_gap and news_curr_vol vs news_mov_vol (use news_ratio_vol). Applied SUGGESTION1 and used ts_backfill for any low coverage fields (ratio_vol coverage 0.5122 -> backfill). Confidence 0.53.
Prefer EPS surprises in liquid names: divide news_eps_actual zscore by news_mov_vol zscore. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.72.
Winsorize 10min returns before zscoring to reduce outliers: winsorize(news_pct_10min) then ts_zscore. SUGGESTION1 used single field. Confidence 0.69.
Use ts_kurtosis of intraday returns (news_pct_5_min) to detect fat-tailed moves likely to continue; applied ts_kurtosis on news_pct_5_min. SUGGESTION2 not used. Confidence 0.52.
Prefer momentum in low P/E names (potential undervaluation momentum). Divide news_pct_30min zscore by news_pe_ratio zscore. Both high coverage. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.63.
Use nws12_prez_30_seconds or 1_minute (pre-market) to predict open move; low coverage fields backfilled per SUGGESTION3. Confidence 0.49.
Normalize news_max_up_amt by news_atr14 to remove size bias and prefer significant moves. Both high coverage; SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.64.
Trade when eod_vwap deviates from TONLast (news_ton_last) significantly. SUGGESTION1 used two high-coverage fields. Confidence 0.62.
Use news_range_stddev (coverage 0.6172) after ts_backfill to capture range expansion relative to 30-day norm. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.53.
Multiply short-return zscore by tot_ticks zscore to favor active continuation. Both fields high coverage. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Fast reversal when 30sec spike lacks ticks
results.description: If 30sec spike but low ticks, expect reversal. Combine news_pct_30sec and news_tot_ticks (inverse). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.57.
If prevday volatility low (news_prev_day_ret), expect bigger reaction; news_prev_day_ret coverage 0.7311 so no backfill. Combined with news_pct_60min. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Momentum decay: trade_when recent move positive
results.description: Only trade when recent 5-min return positive: trade_when(ts_zscore(news_pct_5_min,5) > 0, ts_zscore(news_pct_10min,5), NaN). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.6.
Use ts_ir on news_pct_1min to find names with high mean/std (stable short-term returns). SUGGESTION1 used single field. Confidence 0.5.
Combine news_mins_5_pct_up (fast move) with news_vol_stddev (volume surge) to confirm breakout. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; both have good coverage. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Oversold bounce using max down amount and time
results.description: If max down amount large but recovered quickly (small mins to bounce), expect further upside. Used news_max_dn_amt and news_mins_1_chg. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.56.
Use news_pct_30sec zscore reversed to fade micro spikes. High coverage so SUGGESTION3 not used. Confidence 0.55.
Multiply winsorized news_pct_10min zscore with winsorized news_curr_vol zscore to avoid outliers. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.65.
Use news_pct_30min minus SPY move embedded in news_indx_perf; single field with high coverage. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.64.

If PE extremely high/low, attenuate signal: if_else(pe zscore > 2, 0.5*momentum, momentum). Kept implementation simple: if_else(greater(ts_zscore(news_pe_ratio,30),2), multiply(0.5, ts_zscore(news_pct_10min,5)), ts_zscore(news_pct_10min,5)). SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.6.
If TONLast exceeds EODHigh (data post-event), fade intraday extreme; used news_ton_last and news_eod_high (high coverage). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.54.
Scale news_pct_10min over 20 days (ts_scale) to get consistent signal. SUGGESTION1 used single field. Confidence 0.58.
Use news_vol_stddev to detect volume shocks confirming price moves. Single high-quality field used per SUGGESTION1/4. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Momentum with decay (hump) to reduce turnover
results.description: Apply hump to 10min zscore to reduce turnover while preserving signal. SUGGESTION1 applied; hump used per operator list. Confidence 0.6.
Use ts_arg_max on short returns to find stocks making local highs recently and trade continuation. Single field used. Confidence 0.51.

results.idea: Earnings surprise normalized by market cap
results.description: Divide eps actual zscore by market cap zscore to focus on meaningful surprises in midsize names. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: Intraday reversal when range vs avg large
results.description: Use news_range_stddev (backfilled if needed) reversed to fade extreme ranges relative to 30-day norm. SUGGESTION3 applied when coverage low. Confidence 0.52.
Use nws12_allz_provider (provider index) to neutralize providers with low historical predictive power; provider used as a conditional filter. coverage high; SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.48.
Divide momentum by mins to 3% move (faster moves get higher weight). Used news_mins_3_pct_up. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.61.
If prevday had large move, expect weaker continuation today: multiply momentum by inverse prevday move zscore. Used news_prev_day_ret (coverage ok). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.53.
Use news_pct_90min to capture mid-intraday continuation; high coverage. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Trading signal attenuated by prevvol gaps
results.description: If previous day's volume extremely low, attenuate momentum: divide by ts_zscore(prev_vol) (prev_vol coverage 0.0374 -> ts_backfill used). SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.45.
Combination of eps actual and immediate 1-min return: multiply eps zscore by 1-min return zscore. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.8.

results.idea: Fast reversal when small time-to-5% down
results.description: If price goes down 5% quickly (nws12_mainz_5s small), expect bounce; use inverse zscore. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Momentum normalized by ticks per minute
results.description: Divide pct_10min by tot_ticks scaled to prefer high-activity moves. Both high coverage. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Post-news momentum subject to hump smoothing
results.description: Apply hump to news_pct_1min zscore to reduce turnover while preserving directional edge. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Volume-adjusted reversal: volstddev high & negative return
results.description: If volume surge (news_vol_stddev high) but return negative, expect mean-reversion; combine volstddev and reversed return. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Pre vs post open move confirmation
results.description: If dayopen deviates strongly from tonlast and the move matches early returns, trade continuation. Used news_dayopen and news_ton_last (coverages >0.7). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Earnings surprise momentum filtered by PE extremes
results.description: Combine eps actual with a PE-based attenuation: if pe zscore > 2 then reduce signal. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.72.
Use news_ratio_vol (backfilled if low coverage) zscore to capture volume breakouts confirming price moves. SUGGESTION3 applied when needed. Confidence 0.58.
ts_ir(news_pct_1min,20) multiplied by tot_ticks to prefer stable, high-activity names. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.56.
Multiply zscores across 1min and 30min to find persistent moves (kept to two fields). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.7.
If mins-to-3% down is very small (fast decline), expect short-lived panic and fade using reverse. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.54.
Apply ts_scale to news_pct_60min to normalize across time windows. SUGGESTION1 used single field. Confidence 0.57.
If PE extreme (>2 sigma) damp momentum: if_else(pe_z>2, 0.6*mom, mom). Applied SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4. Confidence 0.59.
Long when eps positive and short_interest high: multiply ts_zscore(news_eps_actual,10) by ts_zscore(news_short_interest,30). SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.76.
Use nws12_afterhsz_1_minute (after-hours 1-min move) backfilled and reversed for mean reversion at open. SUGGESTION3 applied for backfill. Confidence 0.5.
Divide short-return zscore by distance to post_vwap to emphasize moves supported by executed prices. SUGGESTION1 used news_post_vwap and news_pct_10min. Confidence 0.61.
If minutes-to-1% up (nws12_mainz_1l) is small after a dip, expect continuation; use inverse zscore. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.58.
If session_range small (low coverage -> backfill), prefer momentum trades; applied ts_backfill per SUGGESTION3. Confidence 0.46.
If max_up_ret large and mov_vol large, trade continuation: multiply two zscores. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Fast breakout detection combining 1min return and ticks
results.description: Multiply 1-min return zscore by tot_ticks to favor rapid, active breakouts. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: Fade high ATR days after initial spike
results.description: If atr_ratio very high (news_atr_ratio), fade immediate move expecting pullback. SUGGESTION1 used; high coverage. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by market cap bucket
results.description: Scale momentum by cap using divide with news_cap to prefer midcap signals (SUGGESTION4 applied). coverage high so no backfill. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Micro reversal when 30sec move without volume
results.description: If 30sec move strong but volstddev low, expect reversal; combine news_pct_30sec and news_vol_stddev inverse. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.55.
Use news_mins_20_pct_up (coverage 0.9673) inverse to pick fast large moves and follow-through. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Post-news max-up amt normalized by prevclose
results.description: Divide news_max_upamt by prevclose to get percent-like measure; prevclose low coverage -> ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.5.

Multiply momentum by provider reliability proxy (nws12_provider index used as filter). Provider index used only as condition to avoid group-alone misuse. SUGGESTION1 & KEEP_IN_MINDs observed. Confidence 0.47.

results.idea: Post-news continuation measured by 120min return vs index
results.description: Use nws12_mainz_result_vs_index (coverage high) to pick stock-specific sustained moves. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.65.
Apply ts_av_diff to news_pct_10min to remove long-term mean bias; single field used. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.56.
If news_range_stddev high and volstddev high, trade continuation (multiply both zscores). Applied ts_backfill if necessary. SUGGESTION1&3 applied. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Fast momentum when prevwap close to ton_last
results.description: If prevwap approx TONLast and large post-news return, prefer continuation. Use news_prevwap (coverage varies -> backfill) and news_pct_10min. SUGGESTION3 applied if coverage low. Confidence 0.49.
Multiply zscores of 5min and 60min returns to capture consistent trend across intraday horizons. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Momentum adjusted by post-vwap distance magnitude
results.description: Scale momentum by absolute distance between TONLast and post_vwap (larger distance -> more conviction). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Fade overnight gap when low ticks
results.description: If large open gap but low tot_ticks, expect gap fill; combine news_open_gap and news_tot_ticks (inverse). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.52.
Winsorize news_pct_1min to limit outliers before zscore. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Earnings positive with low PE strong buy
results.description: Long when eps positive and PE low: if_else(and(greater(ts_zscore(news_eps_actual,10),0), less(ts_zscore(news_pe_ratio,30),0)), ts_zscore(news_eps_actual,10), NaN). SUGGESTION1 & 4 applied. Confidence 0.78.
If volstddev is extremely high but returns muted, expect reversal; reverse combination of volstddev and pct_30min. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Momentum attenuated by high previous-day move
results.description: If previous day moved strongly, reduce intraday momentum bet; implemented by multiply with reverse prevday zscore. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.51.

results.idea: Post-news breakout if pre-vwap close to tonlast
results.description: If pre_vwap equals TONLast and intra returns strong, trade momentum; pre_vwap coverage good so SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.55.
Divide momentum by sqrt(cap) to avoid dominance of mega-cap moves. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Short-term reversal when mins_to_4pct down very small
results.description: Use news_mins_4_pct_dn (coverage 0.971) inverse to find fast drops and fade. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Momentum conditional on post-vwap above pre-vwap
results.description: If post_vwap > pre_vwap and pct_10min positive, go long; combined two fields per SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by inverse PE for value bias
results.description: Multiply momentum by inverse pe zscore (lower PE -> larger weight). SUGGESTION1 & 4 applied. Confidence 0.61.
Multiply 30sec and 5min zscores to favor moves that start immediately and persist. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Microstructure momentum filtered by tot_ticks threshold
results.description: Only trade momentum if tot_ticks zscore above threshold using trade_when. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.58.
